metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Python Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools Python Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Python Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Python.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Python.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior experience with programming.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior experience with programming.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn Python step by step, from the introduction, to creating your first application with Python.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn Python step by step, from the introduction, to creating your first application with Python.

content.text: Get Started With Python »
content.html: Get Started With Python »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching Python programming? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching Python programming? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
Python, like any other programming language, is best learned by working hands-on with code.
content.html: Python, like any other programming language, is best learned by working hands-on with code.

content.text: Easily try code with our "Try it Yourself" editor.
content.html: Easily try code with our "Try it Yourself" editor.

content.text: Here, you can edit Python code and view the result:
content.html: Here, you can edit Python code and view the result:

content.code_html: print("Hello, World!")

content.text: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and deploy Python code and other backend languages.
content.html: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and deploy Python code and other backend languages.

content.text: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice coding and test projects in real-time.
content.html: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice coding and test projects in real-time.

content.text: Spaces allow you to test, build, and deploy code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
content.html: Spaces allow you to test, build, and deploy code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.

content.text: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
content.html: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.

content.text: Features include:
content.html: Features include:

content.text: Create a Spaces Account
content.html: Create a Spaces Account

content.text: Python Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The Python exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Python syllabus.
content.html: The Python exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Python syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Python Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Python Developer" Certification.

content.text: There are two different types of certifications:
content.html: There are two different types of certifications:

content.text: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
content.html: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.

content.text: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Python programming?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Python programming?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
